name: Bristol Run Club
description: Regular runs with 2.5km and 5km groups around Bristol, check their Instagram to confirm the start location each week.

time.details: Meetup from 6:15am, with the run starting at 6:30am. 5km run followed by a post run get together.

cost.details: Free to join, no sign up necessary.

time.details: Meetup from 6:15pm, with the run starting at 6:30pm. Two groups of 2.5km and 5km followed by a post run get together.

cost.details: Free to join, no sign up necessary.

time.details: Meetup from 9:45am, with the run starting at 10:00am. Two groups of 2.5km and 5km followed by a post run get together.

cost.details: Free to join, no sign up necessary.
